mapper.select: SELECT u.id , u.password , GROUP_CONCAT(a.auth) auth , u.email , u.login_failed loginFailed , u.lock_yn lockYn , u.lock_date lockDate , (SELECT login_date FROM login_log WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY login_date DESC limit 1 ) latestLoginDate FROM user u JOIN auth a ON u.id = a.id WHERE u.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET login_failed = login_failed + 1, lock_yn = CASE WHEN login_failed = 5 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, lock_date = CASE WHEN login_failed = 5 THEN now() END WHERE id = #{id}
